theStarKnight:IdentityCrisisEvent.NAME: Identity Crisis

theStarKnight:SicklyFountainEvent.NAME: A Sickly Fountain
DESCRIPTIONS: You pass by a room and glimpse a #gSickly #glooking #gFountain. NL You feel thirsty.
You drink from the fountain, maybe that wasn't a great idea.
You decide it's not worth it.
